text: Ji Seung-hwan (born 10 November 1971) is a South Korean former cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of South Korea Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:Asian Games gold medalists for South Korea Category:Cyclists at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Cyclists at the 1998 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1998 Asian Games
title: Ji Seung-hwan (cyclist)
